reviewText: I was torn with this DVD. I enjoyed the material and felt like it was note worthy. Unfortunately there were a lot of levels which I would have like the material expanded. A lot of the circling movements will feel very familiar if you practice Tai Chi ball or ruler. I also would have preferred more explanation using vocabulary more common to the west. Mind you not that his ocean analogy was bad just felt like it left a lot of ground uncovered  in terms of  weight, shifting, foot placement and  positioning etc..  Maybe a three and a half !
